you could look on the website for the city of Gatlinburg, and chec=
k to see if they have a historical society there. ( we have one here) if so=
, they are usually a fountain of historical information ( with the added bo=
nus that they have already done all the research and verifications, saving =
you countless hours of doing it yourself)
If people ask why you want to kno=
w this stuff ( I have never had a history buff ask me why I wanted to know =
about history) but if they asked, I would say something along the lines of-=
' im interested in the history of this place'.. after all, historical stuff=
, legends and stories real or imagined can be fascinating.
hope that helps =
and good luck
Charm
